name: SII_FDS_Modbus1
action: [IF]([GT](<*VALUE(Number of Modbus Interfaces Types)*>,0)){<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Function Design Specification -Modbus1:<* Eval(16 * 0.9  + (<*VALUE(Number of Modbus Interfaces Types)*> - 1) * 4 * 0.9 )*>)*>}{<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Function Design Specification -Modbus1:0)*>}[ENDIF]
description:
SII Function Design Specification -Modbus1

If mbt > 0  then 
 Calculated Hrs = 16*0.9 + (mbt-1)*4*0.9,  Else Hrs = 0
